description: Initial Toast CSS created. Contains 4 primitive token refs (--t-raw-*) flagged for replacement. Hard-coded 320px, 480px, 3px values present.
Initial Toast spec created. Documents anatomy, JTBD, tokens, accessibility requirements, and known issues.

Nursery issues addressed: replaced --t-raw-blue-600 with var(--t-border-info, var(--t-interactive-default)), --t-raw-green-600 with var(--t-border-success, var(--t-fg-success)), --t-raw-amber-600 with var(--t-border-warning, var(--t-fg-warning)), --t-raw-red-600 with var(--t-border-danger). Added @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) block. Changed dismiss button min-height to var(--t-touch-min). Fixed --t-surface-0 to --t-surface-2 to match spec.

Spec synced with CSS implementation: removed stale knownIssues[0] referencing primitive tokens (already fixed), updated tokens.uses to list all 29 semantic tokens, added futureConsiderations section, corrected maturity to candidate.
Toast promoted to stable zone. maturity set to stable. shielded set to true. First component to complete full terarrium lifecycle.
Initial Toggle CSS created. Contains 2 primitive token refs: --t-raw-neutral-300 (track off-state) and --t-raw-neutral-0 (thumb fill). Missing prefers-reduced-motion. Known issues documented in spec.

Toggle spec created. Documents anatomy (container/input/track/thumb/label), JTBD, variants, tokens, accessibility requirements (role=switch, aria-checked, Space keyboard), and known issues including primitive token refs.
Toggle promoted from nursery to workshop. maturity set to candidate. Nursery agent reviews recorded. Ready for Workshop review cycle with real Anthropic API agent reviews.

Governance orchestrator created. Wires all 5 domain agents into a full review cycle. Calls real Anthropic API via agent-runner.mjs. Writes decisions to decisions.jsonl and activity to activity-log.jsonl.

Express API proxy server created. Endpoints: /api/chat (SSE streaming), /api/governance-review, /api/pipeline, /api/wiki, /api/seed-vault, /api/decisions, /api/activity. Proxies Anthropic API calls with CORS + key security.
